Airoha M0 BLE API  1.0.5.4
Overview

Release Notes

The Airoha M0 BLE API is designed for supporting Bluetooth low energy technology with ARM cortex-M0 series. The API reference will guide the developer to create Bluetooth LE applications, such as beacon, keyboard and mouse, heart rate sensor, ...etc. Shown in SW Architecture, it was designed as two part: GATT services and BLE stacks.

  • BLE Stacks API
  • GATT Services API
